page.title: 20FARMING AND HEDGES CONT
page.content: He said there was no point in continuing to farm small fields and by removing the hedge it would now make it easier to fertilize,seed and spray the two fields on either side.He assured the villagers the footpath would remain. He said he was a conservationist and had planted more than 12,000 trees. _______________________________________ CONCLUSION This record has been compiled by all the children of Bramford Primary School involving all 218 children aged from four to eleven.It was edited by the oldest children in Class 7.Lynsey Emberson,Damian Ranson,Faith Warne, Claire Mason,Nicola Pipe,Anthony Bateman and Justin Burder.
